title: Exclusive and continuing jurisdiction
context: [ยง551G-15] Exclusive and continuing jurisdiction. Except as otherwise provided in section 551G-14, a court that has appointed a guardian or issued a protective order consistent with this chapter has exclusive and continuing jurisdiction over the proceeding until it is terminated by the court or the appointment or order expires by its own terms. [L 2012, c 236, pt of ยง1]
